name: iPhone 11
description: The iPhone 11 is the latest iPhone from Apple. It features a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display, an A13 Bionic chip, and a dual-camera system with a 12MP Ultra Wide and Wide cameras.

name: iPhone 11 Pro
description: The iPhone 11 Pro is the latest iPhone from Apple. It features a 5.8-inch Super Retina XDR display, an A13 Bionic chip, and a triple-camera system with a 12MP Ultra Wide, Wide, and Telephoto cameras.

name: iPhone 11 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 11 Pro Max is the latest iPhone from Apple. It features a 6.5-inch Super Retina XDR display, an A13 Bionic chip, and a triple-camera system with a 12MP Ultra Wide, Wide, and Telephoto cameras.

name: iPhone SE
description: The iPhone SE is the latest iPhone from Apple. It features a 4.7-inch Retina HD display, an A13 Bionic chip, and a single-camera system with a 12MP Wide camera.

name: iPhone XR
description: The iPhone XR is the latest iPhone from Apple. It features a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display, an A12 Bionic chip, and a single-camera system with a 12MP Wide camera.
